name: trj_cavity
short_description:
trj_cavity finds protein cavities througout Molecular Dynamics (MD) simulation trajectories. The program works with files in PDB format, but it also can read/generate GROMACS compatible formats such as XTC. 

The same project can be compiled as a GROMACS tool or as a standalone version. Installation instructions are provided in the INSTALL file of the project and in https://sourceforge.net/p/trjcavity/wiki/Home/#ffad

If you need support using this tool (or report bugs), please post it in the discussion forum. 

Remarks: Version 1.1 contains some fixes related to non-funtional input parameters. Additionally, the installation of the Gromacs version has been  simplified. Note that trj_cavity doesn't support GROMACS 5.x yet, as GROMACS 5 no longer supports the old analysis API, and the new one is currenly not operative.
